issue.title: [C++][Doc] Improve API docs coverage
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15435](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15435). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We don't often update the API docs when adding new APIs, so chances are some classes or functions are not exposed in the API docs. We should make a pass to find out missing APIs and add them.
